title: "Axle raises $1.6M for energy AI"
excerpt: "Axle, an AI energy startup, raised a $1.6 million pre-seed round led by Picus Capital. Why it matters: As the electricity grid cleans up and adds energy devices like EVs and heat pumps, it's becoming more complex. Energy providers will need better software using AI to manage how these energy machines will work together."
